snippet: Researchers detected eggs of intestinal worms in stool samples with about 70 percent accuracy using an iPhone with an $8 lens attached.
abstract: Dr Isaac Bogoch study published in American Journal of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene reports creation of microscope capable of diagnosing round worms in children by sticking $8 lens to iPhone with piece of double-sided tape; microscope detects worms with 70 percent accuracy of conventional microscope.
lead_paragraph: Researchers detected eggs of intestinal worms in stool samples with about 70 percent accuracy using an iPhone with an $8 lens attached.

headline.print_headline: An iPhone Jury-Rigged as a Microscope
headline.main: An iPhone Jury-Rigged as a Microscope

keywords.name: organizations
